Ivory Tower Wizard Janssen:
I will tell you what to do.

This powerful device can grind any magic item. The Shredder is not used for bad purposes, we made it so that during the grinding of the items he is gradually destroyed.
If this happens before You chop all the Pieces, you can find another Chopper.
